name: Zero Gravity (itch) (Rayan Aziz)
description:
{WEBGL Version was a bit buggy, So I removed it]

Venture into an Endless Void of Zero Gravity, Where you have to Dodge all the Obstacles and make it to the top of Leaderboard, Challenge your Friends and Family Who can make a High Score, You or Them?

Play now, This free Title of ours.

NOTICE: We'll keep updating the Game, Your Feedback will be Appreciated!
